channel.title: Clearwater River on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Clearwater River on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-12 East/US-95 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 South/US-12 East to Grangeville, Missoula (MT - via US-12), and Boise. The Clearwater River is on the right side of the picture.

item.title: US-12 East - Idaho's Northwest Passage Scenic Byway
item.description: US-12 East - Idaho’s Northwest Passage Scenic Byway along the Clearwater River in Nez Perce County.
